Evidence: Addition of PDGF-BB (100 ng/ml) raised the expression levels of LUM (4-fold), CHI3L1 (9-fold), and CHI3L2 (11-fold) above those of normal medium () and, thus, stimulated the expansion related genes even further ().
Subject: p(FPLX:"PDGF_BB")

Evidence: CHI3L2 has recently been reported to activate the MAPK pathway through phosphorylation of ERK1/2 in glial tumor cells.
Subject: p(HGNC:CHI3L2)

Evidence: In contrast to the activation of ERK1/2 phosphorylation by CHI3L1 that leads to a proliferative signal (similar to the EGF effect in PC12 cells), activation of ERK1/2 phosphorylation by CHI3L2 (similar to NGF) inhibits cell mitogenesis and proliferation.
Subject: p(HGNC:CHI3L2)
